A '''potato stem''' is a [[April Fools' Day jokes|joke]] log-type [[block]], only present in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Potato stems can be broken using any tool, but an [[axe]] is the fastest. Additionally, [[sword]]s speed up the breaking time.

{{Breaking row|horizontal=1|Potato Stem|Axe|sword=1|hidecopper=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Potato stems generate naturally as part of [[potato tree]]s, as well as in [[potato village]]s and [[potato mineshaft]]s.

== Usage ==
=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{Crafting
|head=1

}}
{{Crafting

|A3=Potato Stem
|B3=Potato Stem
|C3=Potato Stem
|Output=Potato Hanging Sign
|ignoreusage=1
|foot=1
}}

Potato stems cannot be [[Stripped Log|strip]]ped with an [[axe]] and cannot be [[Crafting|craft]]ed into [[wood]] or [[hyphae]], unlike all other log-like blocks.
